sqlMap.select: select num,id,subject,point,contents,fileName,startDate,endDate,state from tb_event natural join tb_member order by num desc
select num,id,subject,point,contents,fileName,startDate,endDate,state from tb_event natural join tb_member where endDate > sysdate order by num desc
select num,id,subject,point,contents,fileName,startDate,endDate,state from tb_event natural join tb_member where endDate < sysdate order by num desc
select num,subject from TB_EVENT where num in( (select max(num) from tb_event where num<#parameter#))
select num,subject from TB_EVENT where num in( (select min(num) from tb_event where num>#parameter#))
